mapper.sql: ftr_id, ftr_bid_id, ftr_origin_id, ftr_operator, ftr_user_id, ftr_bid_type, ftr_transfer_money, ftr_pay_fee, ftr_guar_fee, ftr_real_pay_fee, ftr_real_guar_fee, ftr_transfer_date, ftr_seq_no, ftr_deal_state, ftr_transfer_type
mapper.insert: insert into abc_full_transfer_record (ftr_id, ftr_bid_id, ftr_origin_id, ftr_operator, ftr_user_id, ftr_bid_type, ftr_transfer_money, ftr_pay_fee, ftr_guar_fee, ftr_real_pay_fee, ftr_real_guar_fee, ftr_transfer_date, ftr_seq_no,ftr_deal_state, ftr_transfer_type ) values (#{ftrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ftrBidId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{ftrOriginId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ftrOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ftrUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ftrBidType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ftrTransferMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ftrPayFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ftrGuarFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ftrRealPayFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ftrRealGuarFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ftrTransferDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ftrSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftrDealState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ftrTransferType,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:
update abc_full_transfer_record
ftr_bid_id = #{ftrBidId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ftr_origin_id = #{ftrOriginId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ftr_operator = #{ftrOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ftr_user_id = #{ftrUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ftr_bid_type = #{ftrBidType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ftr_transfer_money = #{ftrTransferMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_pay_fee = #{ftrPayFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_guar_fee = #{ftrGuarFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_real_pay_fee = #{ftrRealPayFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_real_guar_fee = #{ftrRealGuarFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_transfer_date = #{ftrTransferDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ftr_seq_no = #{ftrSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ftr_deal_state = #{ftrDealState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ftr_transfer_type = #{ftrTransferType,jdbcType=TINYINT}
where ftr_id = #{ftrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update abc_full_transfer_record
ftr_bid_id = #{ftrBidId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ftr_origin_id = #{ftrOriginId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ftr_operator = #{ftrOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ftr_user_id = #{ftrUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ftr_bid_type = #{ftrBidType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ftr_transfer_money = #{ftrTransferMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_pay_fee = #{ftrPayFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_guar_fee = #{ftrGuarFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_real_pay_fee = #{ftrRealPayFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_real_guar_fee = #{ftrRealGuarFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ftr_transfer_date = #{ftrTransferDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ftr_deal_state = #{ftrDealState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ftr_transfer_type = #{ftrTransferType,jdbcType=TINYINT}
where ftr_seq_no = #{ftrSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(DISTINCT YEAR(ftr_transfer_date)) FROM abc_full_transfer_record where ftr_deal_state = 1

SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(ftr_transfer_date) FROM abc_full_transfer_record where ftr_deal_state = 1
limit #{pageCondition.pageOffset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageCondition.pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from abc_full_transfer_record WHERE ftr_transfer_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND DATE_ADD(#{beginDate},INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

select loan_id from abc_loan where loan_full_transferedtime BETWEEN #{date} AND DATE_ADD(#{date},INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
and loan_no like concat('%', #{loanNo}, '%')
and loan_category = #{loanCategory}
and loan_deleted = 0

SELECT tl_id FROM abc_transfer_loan JOIN abc_loan ON tl_origin_id = loan_id where tl_full_transferedtime BETWEEN #{date} AND DATE_ADD(#{date},INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
and loan_no like concat('%', #{loanNo}, '%')
and loan_category = #{loanCategory}
and loan_deleted = 0

SELECT bl_id FROM abc_buy_loan JOIN abc_loan ON bl_origin_id = loan_id where bl_full_transferedtime BETWEEN #{date} AND DATE_ADD(#{date},INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
and loan_no like concat('%', #{loanNo}, '%')
and loan_category = #{loanCategory}
and loan_deleted = 0
